summary:
**Horizon Forbidden West** is a 2022 action game where you play as Aloy in a post-apocalyptic America. You explore an open world, fight machine creatures, and try to stop a deadly plague. The game adds new features like underwater exploration and better melee combat.

Developed by Guerrilla Games, it cost over $200 million to make and took four years. Critics liked the visuals, combat, and quests but thought the story could be better. It sold very well and was nominated for big awards. An expansion, **Burning Shores**, was also released.
title: Horizon Forbidden West
